title: Build a ML model for GitHub Issue classification | ML.NET [5 of 8]
excerpt: In the world of ML.NET there is a high-volume of interaction with GitHub. This video will teach you how to classify incoming GitHub issues into one of the many tags (labels) using a multi-class classification algorithm.  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here:
